Have a great day, Nicolette

From: Vipul Vaishnav [mailto:vips.vaishnav@gmail.com] Sent: Wednesday, January 04, 2012 2:58 PM To: Nicolette Taylor Subject: Re: Vipul Vaishnav Phone Appointment
1 p.m. would definitely work. Thank you so much.. - Vipul On Wed, Jan 4, 2012 at 2:42 PM, Nicolette Taylor <ntaylor@mbopartners.com> wrote: Hi Vipul,
I can do 1:00pm tomorrow if that works. I am in meetings the rest of the day though and will not have any availability Friday either.
Thank you and speak with you at 1:00pm. If something else comes up we can reschedule for next week sometime.
Nicolette

Hi Nicole,
Can we reschedule our appointment erlier in teh day (9:00 a.m.) or after 1:00 p.m. If that does not work, we can talk on Friday. Sorry to ask you to reschdule.
Thanks.
-Vipul @ 860.614.4023 On Tue, Jan 3, 2012 at 11:41 AM, Vipul Vaishnav <vips.vaishnav@gmail.com> wrote: Thanks.. Looking forward.
